name: Aura Break
description: Anyone emitting a particularly evil aura will be purified, anyone with an aura of purity will be corrupted by evil by coming close to this Pokemon
effect: Terrain Effects set by the User or one of their Allies solely benefit the User and their Allies (ex: Electric Terrain would not cure opponents of Drowsy. Under Misty Terrain Dragon Type Attacks used by the User and Allies still add their Power to their Damage Pool).
